# hearingDevicePairedEarDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that UIKit posts when there’s a change to the currently paired hearing devices.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static let hearingDevicePairedEarDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Audio and speech

- **monoAudioStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when system audio changes from stereo to mono.
- **speakScreenStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Screen setting changes.
- **speakSelectionStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Selection setting changes.

items.description: A notification that UIKit posts when system audio changes from stereo to mono.
